name: Kronoson
description:
GITHUB REPO

ah yes, the great controllers of our time:

- The Nintendo Switch Pro Controller

- The Playstation Dualshock

- The Classic Keyboard and Mouse

- The Microphone

wait...The Microphone?

KRONOSON is a 2D ACTION PLATFORMER where you CONTROL TIME WITH YOUR VOICE (talking brings time to normal speed, and not talking brings you into slow motion.)

ALL OF THE CONTROLS are in the game, but make sure you have a FUNCTIONING MICROPHONE, or you won't be able to play properly.

Oh, and you might also get some warnings from your anti-virus when you play (this application will obviously have to access your microphone).
